name: CoffeeMudProgrammingLanguage
short_description:
The CoffeeMudProgrammingLanguage is a language that allows archons and coders to code new things such as commands, mobs, help files, etc without having to go into the MudGrinder. This language only works on CoffeeMud5.7.11 and later. You can start it with the following command:
cmpl <--optionname> or <-optionname> <whattodo> <outputlogfile> <createdir> <level> <category> <otheroptions> <launchcmpleditor>
For instance, you could do
cmpl --ocmple create help 1998 other start
You don't have to use all options. use ?, --help or -h to see the full list of commands, but its just to hard to specify those options. Try
cmpl start
to dive in! Read the wiki for more info.
summary: This is an easy to use programming language. No download available.
